scenes.background: [Bob] looks frustrated as he reads your message while [Monica] sighs.
scenes.description: 'I understand you're on leave, but we really could use your input. What's your final call?'

options.text: Alright, I'll review it briefly and give you my thoughts.
options.analysis: You decided to help despite being on leave, showing strong empathy and social skills, but lower self-regulation.

options.text: I can't, I'm on leave. You'll have to manage without me.
options.analysis: You maintained your boundaries, showing strong self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: Let me quickly review it, but I won't be able to deep dive.
options.analysis: You offered partial help, showing balanced empathy and social skills, but your motivation and self-regulation were not particularly high.
